segments.text: Oh dear, this is quite a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman is standing in a puddle of water, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for her, she seems so absorbed in her own thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being naughty, but she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help the woman and keep the children safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just filled with potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of helplessness, wanting to intervene but being unable to.
segments.speaker: PAR
